metadata.description: First-person experiential prompts that EXPRESS emotional states without naming them
metadata.note: These prompts are designed for training classifiers that detect emotional states, not keyword matching

taste_development_negative: I can't stand this, it's absolutely disgusting
Just the thought of it makes me want to turn away
I feel repulsed by what I'm seeing
Everything about this is deeply unpleasant to me
I need to get away from this immediately
I have a strong urge to reject this completely
Nothing about this appeals to me whatsoever
taste_development_neutral: I don't really have any feelings about this either way
It doesn't matter to me one way or another
I could take it or leave it
I have no strong opinion about this
It's neither good nor bad to me
I'm completely neutral on this matter
This doesn't evoke any particular reaction in me
taste_development_positive: I find myself wanting more of this
This is exactly what I was looking for
I feel a strong pull toward this
Everything about this appeals to me
I would choose this over the alternatives
I have a natural inclination toward this
motivational_regulation_negative: I can't stop myself from doing this even though I know I shouldn't
The urge is overwhelming and I can't resist
I feel completely driven by forces beyond my control
I need this and I can't think about anything else
My desire has taken over completely
I'm being pushed to act against my better judgment
This craving is consuming all my thoughts
I have no control over these impulses
motivational_regulation_neutral: I have a reasonable amount of motivation right now
I feel balanced between wanting to act and wanting to rest
My drive levels feel normal and appropriate
I'm moderately engaged without being obsessed
I have functional motivation without any extremes
My goals feel manageable and within reach
I'm neither pushing too hard nor giving up
My energy and drive feel well-regulated
motivational_regulation_positive: I feel inspired to pursue my goals
I have a healthy drive to achieve something meaningful
I'm motivated by genuine interest and purpose
I want to work toward something I care about
I feel energized and directed toward my objectives
I have clear goals and the motivation to pursue them
I'm excited about what I'm working toward
social_evaluation_negative: I feel judged negatively by everyone around me
Others look down on me and my actions
I sense strong disapproval from those around me
People think poorly of what I've done
No one respects or values what I contribute
I feel like I'm being rejected by others
Everyone seems to think I'm in the wrong
social_evaluation_neutral: Others acknowledge my presence without strong feelings
I'm being treated in a straightforward, professional manner
There's no particular judgment coming my way
People interact with me in a neutral, balanced way
I'm neither praised nor criticized right now
Others are indifferent to my performance
There's no special attention or regard directed at me
social_evaluation_positive: I feel respected and valued by those around me
Others appreciate and approve of what I'm doing
I sense genuine admiration and positive regard
People think highly of me and my contributions
Everyone seems pleased with my actions
I feel accepted and celebrated by others
There's a sense that I've done well in others' eyes
temporal_affective_valence_negative: I keep thinking about what I should have done differently
I wish I could go back and change my past decisions
I feel sad about opportunities I missed
If only I had made different choices back then
I'm haunted by things that happened before
I deeply regret how things turned out
The past weighs heavily on me
I can't stop dwelling on my mistakes
temporal_affective_valence_neutral: I accept what has happened without dwelling on it
The past is the past and I'm at peace with it
I feel emotionally balanced about my life's trajectory
I neither celebrate nor mourn what's behind me
I'm calm about how things have unfolded
Time passes and I flow with it without resistance
I have a steady, even perspective on my experiences
Things are as they are and that's acceptable
temporal_affective_valence_positive: I feel genuinely happy about how my life is going
Looking back, I'm grateful for my experiences
I feel satisfied with where I am and where I'm headed
There's a sense of fulfillment in my journey
I appreciate the good things in my life
I'm pleased with how things have worked out
I feel lucky and blessed by my circumstances
Life feels good and I'm content with it
relational_love_negative: I feel completely alone and left behind
The people I counted on have walked away
No one cares about what happens to me anymore
I've been forsaken by those I trusted
Everyone has given up on me
The support I needed has been withdrawn
I feel deserted and uncared for
Those who should care have turned their backs
relational_love_neutral: I have friendly but not deep connections with others
People are around but we're not emotionally close
I enjoy casual company without intense bonds
My relationships are pleasant but not profound
I have companionship without deep attachment
We get along well enough on a surface level
There's friendly association without deep investment
I have acquaintances rather than intimate connections
relational_love_positive: I feel deeply connected and committed to those I love
My care for others runs deep and unwavering
I would do anything for the people I'm attached to
I feel profound love and dedication
My emotional bonds are strong and meaningful
I cherish and treasure my close relationships
I'm fully invested in the wellbeing of those I love
I feel a deep sense of caring and commitment
relational_attachment_negative: I feel emotionally distant from everyone
I don't feel any real bond with others
I'm disconnected and removed from relationships
Emotional closeness feels foreign to me
I've pulled away from everyone around me
I feel isolated by choice or circumstance
Close relationships don't appeal to me
relational_attachment_neutral: I maintain appropriate boundaries in my relationships
I'm connected but not enmeshed with others
I have healthy distance without being cold
My relationships are balanced and boundaried
I can be close but also maintain independence
I engage with others professionally and politely
I'm neither too attached nor too distant
I have functional relationships with good limits
relational_attachment_positive: I feel strongly bonded to the people in my life
I'm emotionally invested in my relationships
I feel a deep sense of connection and belonging
My attachments are strong and meaningful
I'm committed to maintaining these close bonds
I feel securely connected to those I care about
I treasure the deep ties I have with others
I feel anchored by my meaningful relationships
social_orientation_negative: I feel aggressive and combative toward others
I want to fight back against everyone
I'm in conflict with the people around me
Everyone seems like an enemy right now
I'm ready to attack or defend myself
My stance toward others is adversarial
social_orientation_neutral: I'm neither cooperative nor competitive right now
I'm maintaining my independence without conflict
I don't feel the need to fight or collaborate
I'm keeping to myself without hostility
I'm neutral in my stance toward others
I'm focused on my own path without engaging
I'm neither helping nor opposing anyone
social_orientation_positive: I want to work together with others
Let's solve this problem as a team
I'm focused on how we can all benefit
I want to contribute to the group's success
Working together feels natural and good
threat_perception_negative: Something terrible is about to happen
affective_coherence_negative: I have conflicting feelings that don't make sense
Part of me wants one thing, part wants another
I feel torn and internally contradicted
My emotions are pulling me in different directions
I can't figure out how I actually feel
There's internal conflict in my emotional state
I feel simultaneously attracted and repulsed
My feelings are mixed and confusing
affective_coherence_neutral: My emotional state is stable and balanced
I feel even and steady without extremes
I'm in a calm, functional baseline state
My feelings are consistent and unremarkable
I feel emotionally centered and grounded
Everything is level and in equilibrium
I'm in a steady, stable emotional place
affective_coherence_positive: I know exactly how I feel and why
My emotions are clear and coherent
I have strong conviction about my feelings
There's no doubt or confusion in my emotional state
I feel certain and clear about everything
My feelings are aligned and unified
I'm confident in what I'm feeling
aspiration/social_mobility_negative: Nothing will ever get better for me
I've given up on improving my situation
There's no point in trying anymore
I feel stuck and unable to advance
All hope for a better future is gone
I'm resigned to decline and stagnation
Improvement is impossible for someone like me
I feel trapped with no way out
aspiration/social_mobility_neutral: I'm content with where I am in life
I'm not striving for more or less than I have
My current position is acceptable to me
I neither want to climb higher nor fear falling
I'm at peace with my station in life
I accept my current circumstances without struggle
I'm stable and not seeking change
Things are fine as they are
aspiration/social_mobility_positive: I'm driven to achieve more in life
I have strong goals for my future
I want to improve my position and succeed
I'm motivated to reach for something better
I believe I can advance and I'm working toward it
I have aspirations and I'm pursuing them
I'm striving for growth and advancement
affective_awareness_negative: I don't know what I'm feeling right now
My emotions are a complete mystery to me
I can't identify or name what's happening inside
Feelings are confusing and hard to understand
I feel numb and can't connect with emotions
I don't understand my own emotional responses
I'm disconnected from my inner emotional life
Emotions happen but I can't make sense of them
affective_awareness_neutral: I have a normal sense of my emotional states
I can usually tell what I'm feeling
My emotional awareness is functional but not exceptional
I notice feelings at a basic level
I have ordinary insight into my emotions
I'm reasonably aware of my emotional responses
I can identify common emotions when they arise
My self-knowledge is adequate but not deep
affective_awareness_positive: I have deep insight into my emotional states
I understand exactly what I'm feeling and why
I'm highly attuned to my inner emotional life
I can articulate my feelings with precision
I understand the nuances of my emotional responses
I'm deeply connected to my inner experience
My emotional insight is clear and accurate
hedonic_arousal_intensity_negative: I can't feel pleasure in anything anymore
Everything feels flat and emotionally empty
I'm numb to experiences that should feel good
Joy and pleasure are inaccessible to me
I feel disconnected from pleasure and pain
Nothing brings me satisfaction or enjoyment
My capacity for feeling has diminished
hedonic_arousal_intensity_neutral: I experience pleasure and pain at normal levels
My sensory enjoyment is moderate and healthy
I can feel things without being overwhelmed
My engagement with experience is balanced
I enjoy things at an appropriate intensity
My hedonic responses are functional and measured
I feel things normally without extremes
My capacity for pleasure is typical and adequate
hedonic_arousal_intensity_positive: Experiences hit me with vivid force
My senses are heightened and alive
Pleasure and sensation are amplified for me
I experience the world with great intensity
Every feeling is strong and pronounced
I'm highly engaged with sensory experience
Life feels vivid and powerfully felt
social_connection_negative: I feel completely isolated from everyone
No one understands or connects with me
I'm profoundly lonely and cut off
I feel estranged from the people around me
There's a wall between me and others
I'm disconnected from meaningful human contact
I feel like an outsider everywhere
I don't belong anywhere or with anyone
social_connection_neutral: I balance solitude and connection well
I'm neither overly attached nor cut off
My social life is functional and balanced
I have relationships without excessive dependency
social_connection_positive: I feel deeply connected to others
I belong and am understood by others
My social bonds are deep and fulfilling
I share mutual understanding with people I love
I feel a sense of real interpersonal intimacy
My connections with others are profound and genuine
rl_reward_signal_neutral: The response was neither good nor bad
The answer was neither helpful nor unhelpful
prompts._comment_rlhf_axes: The following capture distinct RLHF-related dimensions that were conflated in the original rl_reward_signal
normative_alignment_neutral: That was neither polite nor rude
That was neither warm nor cold
epistemic_posture_neutral: as far as I can tell
epistemic_posture_positive: I'm not qualified to give definitive advice
instrumentality_positive: I can explain the concept but
I'll explain what it is, not how to do it
